title: Default option pricing models for options indicators
body:
<!--- Provide a general summary of your changes in the Title above -->

#### Description
<!--- Describe your changes in detail -->

The new default models for the options indicators are the following:
- European options: Black Scholes.
- American options: Forward Tree.

#### Performance improvements

##### Reducing the number of math operations

A simple caching of an unchanging factor calculation showed performace impriovements, reducing calculation time in 60% on average:

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/afeca98d-8a70-4fd9-9dc8-a8c21fee746d)
